Articles.Content: <figure class="tmblr-full" data-orig-height="92" data-orig-width="480"><img src="http://41.media.tumblr.com/ab8ca95fa6c767a94ca66db2600759c6/tumblr_inline_nv1fw4FwIa1rr2wit_540.jpg" data-orig-height="92" data-orig-width="480"/></figure><figure class="tmblr-full" data-orig-height="481" data-orig-width="770"><img src="http://41.media.tumblr.com/49bc4f83612b34b36460b25b6a64e9b8/tumblr_inline_nv1fwgHTDT1rr2wit_540.png" data-orig-height="481" data-orig-width="770"/></figure><p>Ballutes can be used to slow down your rocket in an upper atmosphere. What is a ballute? It’s a cross between a parachute and a balloon, and they can be used as an alternative to a heat shield or airbrake.</p><p>This mod helps when you get into upper thinner atmospheres of Duna, Kerbin or Laythe. Deploy the ballute and you’ll initially see the deceleration is marginal but it picks up quickly when you lower your altitude. You can repack it like a normal parachute if you plan multiple orbital decelerations You can use it complementary to parachute! <a href="https://www.facebook.com/hashtag/ksp?source=feed_text&story_id=1053671677985389">Ã¢â‚¬Âª#Ã¢â‚¬Å½KSPÃ¢â‚¬Â¬</a></p><p><a href="http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/134573">To read more and download it click here</a></p>
I saw this a few days ago, the textures sure look awesome now!
We finally found a decent use for the Round 8.....
Dev Wars Episode III: Revenge of the ROUND-8
Actually the mod is super lightweight: 2 models and 2 textures, only 3Mb, no extra plugins only stock modules used.
Congrats, and lovely texture work! I am absolutely adding this to my save
